entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 04:17 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: NE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
